name: Nyx: The Travelers Call
description:
Our team consists of three teenagers, a mom, and through this jam we met an incredible sound designer, and a fantastic composer. We love this game jam as the inclusivity fits us well, as we have non-binary, asexual and bisexual members.

If our team had more time we would:

Add the rest of sfx (talking, water splashes, etc)

make dialogue richer - increase storytelling element

focus on nyx's personal journey a bit more

include a 'heart system' which encourages the player to help a certain amount of people in a certain amount of time

food system?

mini events - Actually help clean up trash/build house
